description: A little browser extension that draws a pie chart on GitHub User / Org profiles detailing their language breakdown. Built with TypeScript and Chart.js.
name: github-user-languages

scripts.archive-c-dist: cp manifests/chrome.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && zip -r ../c-dist.zip *
scripts.archive-ff-dist: cp manifests/firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && zip -r ../ff-dist.zip *
scripts.archive-src: zip -r src.zip package.json package-lock.json src/ webpack/ tsconfig.json tslint.json README.md
